Ingredients.3: 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 pinch onion powder, or to taste

Ingredients.11: 0.5 (1 ounce) envelopes dry onion soup mix

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.2: Whisk flour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper together in a bowl. Dredge roast in flour mixture to evenly coat.

Directions.3: Melt butter in a large pot over medium-high heat; brown roast in melted butter, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer roast to an oven bag and place into a 13x9-inch casserole dish.

Directions.4: Whisk condensed beef consomme, water, garlic, onion soup mix, and Worcestershire sauce together in a bowl; pour into the oven bag over the roast. Seal the bag and cut 6 small slits in the top of the oven bag for ventilation.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour 45 minutes; add carrots, mushrooms, and onion to the oven bag and bake until vegetables are tender and roast is cooked through, about 45 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
